 26{
 27  static bool const value = false;
 28};

 90
 91namespace impl
 92{
 93
 94template <typename List>
 95struct List_get
 96{
 97  typedef typename List::first first;
 98  typedef typename List::rest  rest;
 99};
100
101template <>
102struct List_get<None_type>
103{
104  typedef None_type first;
105  typedef None_type rest;
106};
107
108/// Template class to determine which tag implements a solver.
109
110/// Requires:
111///   ISTYPEAVAIL to be a template class that, given an ImplTag and
112///      value type, defines VALUE to be true if ImplTag can solve
113///      value type, else false.
114///   T is a value type.
115///   TAGLIST is a list of implementation tags.
116///
117/// Provides:
118///   TYPE to be the first implementation tag from TAGLIST that supports
119///      value type T, else None_type.
120
121template <template <typename, typename> class IsTypeAvail,
122	  typename T,
123	  typename TagList,
124	  typename Tag  = typename List_get<TagList>::first,
125	  typename Rest = typename List_get<TagList>::rest,
126	  bool     Valid = IsTypeAvail<Tag, T>::value>
127struct Choose_solver_impl;
128
129/// Specialization for case where impl tag TAG supports type T.
130template <template <typename, typename> class IsTypeAvail,
131	  typename T,
132	  typename TagList,
133	  typename Tag,
134	  typename Rest>
135struct Choose_solver_impl<IsTypeAvail, T, TagList, Tag, Rest, true>
136{
137  typedef Tag type;
138};
139
140/// Specialization for case where impl tag TAG does not support type T.
141/// Fall through to next entry in TAGLIST.
142template <template <typename, typename> class IsTypeAvail,
143	  typename T,
144	  typename TagList,
145	  typename Tag,
146	  typename Rest>
147struct Choose_solver_impl<IsTypeAvail, T, TagList, Tag, Rest, false>
148  : Choose_solver_impl<IsTypeAvail, T, Rest>
149{};
150
151/// Terminator.  If REST is empty, define type to be None_type.
152template <template <typename, typename> class IsTypeAvail,
153	  typename T,
154	  typename TagList,
155	  typename Tag>
156struct Choose_solver_impl<IsTypeAvail, T, TagList, Tag, None_type, false>
157{
158  typedef None_type type;
159};
160
161
162/// Special terminator.  If original list is empty, define type to
163/// be None_type.
164
165template <template <typename, typename> class IsTypeAvail,
166	  typename T>
167struct Choose_solver_impl<IsTypeAvail, T, None_type, None_type, None_type, false>
168{
169  typedef None_type type;
170};
171
172} // namespace vsip::impl
173} // namespace vsip
